about_the_game:
Delve deeper into the Nightmare with the Angel Wings: Endless Night - Supporter Pack (what a name!) This bundle includes a 97-page artbook as well as over 100 4K wallpapers (3840x2160 pixels) from Endless Night. We thank you for all your support!

Please note that for Steam Deck users, these features are accessible via Desktop mode.

Get behind the scenes of Endless Night with an artbook detailing the creation process, as well as providing new insights and lore into the world of Angel Wings. This 97-page artbook (delivered as a PDF to your installation folder) contains character bios, concept art, and previously unseen extras!

The 4K wallpaper pack contains the vast majority of art in the world of Endless Night, conveniently sorted by chapter and ready for your screen! The wallpaper pack also includes some original compositions ideal for daily desktop use.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains fictional depictions of minor violence with occasional blood.

Please note that for Steam Deck users, these features are accessible via Desktop mode.

Get behind the scenes of Endless Night with an artbook detailing the creation process, as well as providing new insights and lore into the world of Angel Wings. This 97-page artbook (delivered as a PDF to your installation folder) contains character bios, concept art, and previously unseen extras!

The 4K wallpaper pack contains the vast majority of art in the world of Endless Night, conveniently sorted by chapter and ready for your screen! The wallpaper pack also includes some original compositions ideal for daily desktop use.
legal_notice: Angel Wings® and the wing logo are registered trademarks of RumR Design LLC. This story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. No identification with actual persons, places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred. All third party media and assets are used with consent and/or written credit towards their respective owners, where applicable.
